main_definition: If not in the specified way; or if different from what has been mentioned.

meanings_and_examples.example: You can either walk to work, otherwise take the bus.
The cat is sleeping on my bed. Otherwise, it's hiding under the couch.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In other words or another way of saying something
meanings_and_examples.example: I don't like broccoli; otherwise, I love green vegetables.

meanings_and_examples.definition: If not so; if no other way
meanings_and_examples.example: Please be quiet while the baby is sleeping. Otherwise, you might wake it up.
I would go for a run every day. Otherwise, I don't have enough time due to work commitments.
